snippet: Francisco Cervelli, a leading candidate to be the Yankees’ starting catcher, has been linked to the Miami clinic being investigated for dispensing performance-enhancing drugs.
abstract: New York Yankees catcher Francisco Cervelli has been linked to Miami clinic being investigated for dispensing performance-enhancing drugs, hurting his chances of becoming a starter.
lead_paragraph: Francisco Cervelli, a leading candidate to be the Yankees’ starting catcher, has been linked to the Miami clinic being investigated for dispensing performance-enhancing drugs.

headline.seo: Francisco Cervelli Report Raises Questions on Yankees’ Catching
headline.main: Report Clouds the Picture on Yankees’ Catching
headline.print_headline: Report Clouds The Picture On Yankees’ Catching
